title: House for Immediate Sale!
details: Two-storey house with rooftop on approximately 7 perches in Polhena, Kelaniya. Consists of four bedrooms, three washrooms, living room, dining area, pantry and kitchen, garden, and verandah with garage for vehicle parking. Located just 30 minutes outside Colombo. One and a half kilometers from Kiribathgoda junction, Tyre junction, Thorana junction and Kelaniya Campus, and in very close proximity to the Kelani Raja Maha Vihara.
